title: Respond to a Third-Party Subpoena
description: A company (not a party to the lawsuit) receives a subpoena for documents. In-house counsel must manage the response.

tasks.description: Review the subpoena to understand what documents are being requested and the deadline for production.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent understands the scope of the request.

tasks.description: Draft and serve objections to the subpoena if it is overly broad or seeks confidential information.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent prepares legal objections to narrow the scope of the subpoena.

tasks.description: Gather, review, and produce all non-privileged, responsive documents.
tasks.expected_outcome: The company complies with its legal obligations under the subpoena.
